title: Project Tesla
description: TeSLA Project provides to educational institutions, an adaptive trust e-assessment system for assuring e-assessment processes in online environments

title: Project SpaceX
description: SpaceX designs, manufactures and launches advanced rockets and spacecraft.

title: Project Paypal
description: Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy.
